attributes.action: rename all the planets of the solar system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since Pluto was reclassified as a dwarf in 2006 it appears only logical that the planets Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus and Neptune be renamed Bashful, Doc, Dopey, Grumpy, Happy, Sleepy and Sneezy. Our own planet should of course be renamed the planet "Kenny Baker", in honour of the star of the Time Bandits - of the same name.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
